forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy this morning, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
